title: Design of a Mobile Social Networking Education Program for Self-Management and Improved Healthy Lifestyle Habits in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Simulation environment for pre-service/in-service teachers to learn non-pharmacological intervention strategies applicable in real educational settings, emphasizing collaborative learning with personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain self-management principles for type 2 diabetes patients and design educational strategies using mobile platforms
Through VR simulations, learners can guide diabetes patients in improving dietary habits, creating exercise plans, and managing stress
Learners demonstrate competency in developing and executing educational content in mobile social networking environments through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
